metadata.title: CVE-2022-25858 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The package terser before 4.8.1, from 5.0.0 and before 5.14.2 arevulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) due to insecureusage of regular expressions.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
